Replace.Text: Shu, the agricultural master of the Great Yan, the heavenly master of the Tianshi Prefecture. She has been engaged in agricultural research in the northern agricultural base of Yan, Dahuang City, for many years and have achieved rich scientific research results.
Fight against each other endlessly, do not reap the consequences.

Chongyue, the elder brother of landship residents Nian, Dusk, and Ling. He has a close relationship with government organizations such as the Yanese Ministry of War and the Sui Regulator. Previously served as a martial arts instructor at the nomadic city Yumen, a position which he has resigned from.
Warriors from afar rest scarce, the armor they wear spurs them to march.
Ling, resident poet of Shangshu, tied to the Sui Regulator and other governmental organs of Yan.
Clouds ranged as billows, distant-run roads withered. I, departed of the vistas, sailed a ferry in late autumn.
Nine-Colored Deer, claims to come from a mountain forest in Yan, specific location as yet unascertained.
The mind is as truth, a mirror reflecting all ways.
Miss Swire can use her wisdom to solve many problems. The "wisdom" here includes: command, tactics, combat skills, and Money.

Objects that have been shrouded in dust for a long time. She didn't forget it, but simply couldn't bear to touch its rusty edges again; Perhaps one day, it will once again shine with the fierceness of the past.

Lungmen's political leader.Wise, polite, tough, and a good strategist. Highly respected in political circles.Because the lonely city of Lungmen relies on his unconventional diplomatic and commercial ties, it is currently one of the great powers on the world stage. Its present rapid development is proof of that.
Cherish the last moments of rest, everything will become different next year, and you need to be prepared.

Can adjust one more ability for each Tier of Government you unlocked.[NEWLINE]+100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards districts and buildings that are also built in Capital City.[NEWLINE]All wonders provide triple base yields.

Builders receive +1 [ICON_CHARGES] Build Charge. [NEWLINE]Builders can grow agricultural and husbandry resources.[NEWLINE]Every improvement of bonus and luxury resources provide +0.2 yields of all kinds for each population in that city.

Cities with encampment provide its districts an extra standard adjacency bonus from adjacent districts, and can build districts ignoring population limitations.[NEWLINE]After promoting and formating or upgrading promoted a land military unit, receive [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and provide [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to all your cities based on that unit's cost.

+100% adjacency bonuses towards all your disricts adjacent to rivers or mountains, and these districts provide you with +1 [ICON_GREATWRITER] Great Writer Points per turn.[NEWLINE]Adjust +2% yields of all kinds for each Great Writing you created.[NEWLINE]Buildings in Government Plaza have extra 6 [ICON_GREATWORK_WRITING] Great Writing slots.

Start with 'Astrology' unlocked.[NEWLINE]Cities with a Holy Site could build a extra district and purchase buildings with [ICON_FAITH] Faith.[NEWLINE]After all 4 beliefs are added to your religion, bonus 4 more random beliefs.

After reach the [ICON_VISTOPSECRET] Top Secret Visibility to a civilization, allow you to adjust one more ability.[NEWLINE]After the constructions of any building in Government Plaza, grant a free Spy (together with capacity) and a Black Raincoats.[NEWLINE]Increase Spies level by 2 for offensive actions.

Trade routes yield +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each districts in the original city.[NEWLINE]Allow you to Purchase [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production with [ICON_GOLD] Gold in cities with a Commercial Hub[NEWLINE]Increase your treasury by 15% for each time you activate a [ICON_GREATMERCHANT] Great Merchant.

+1 [ICON_FAVOR] Favor per turn for each Governor Title you used.[NEWLINE]Everytime you receive 50 [ICON_FAVOR] Favor, get +1 [ICON_GOVERNOR] Governor Title and +3 [ICON_ENVOY] Influence Tokens as rewards, and increase this threshold by 50 [ICON_FAVOR] Favors.[NEWLINE]Could adjust one more ability if have at least 2 city-states of the same kind are tributary.

Yanese unique district replaces Government Plaza with lower cost. Provide adjacent districts with Huge adjacency bonuses.[NEWLINE]When a Tier of goverment building is built, then also provide the other government buildings' bonuses which at the same Tier.

Yanese(Lungmen) unique district replaces Commercial Hub with lower cost. Provide 3% [ICON_GOLD] Gold of your treasury per turn as interest. Everytime a [ICON_GREATMERCHANT] Great Merchant is activated, all Swire Groups exist receive +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Yanese unique civilian units with 2 charges that can complete a district in one go. Become a Medic after use out. Can only grant everytime you initialize a city.

Wei Yenwu's unique civilian unit that can only grant one everytime a government building is finished.[NEWLINE]When entering the capital city of other major civilizations, sacrifice self to permanently gain +1 diplomatic visibility level to all other players, and allow you to adjust one more trait ability, can be triggered once each civilization.
Grow a random resources of Agriculture or Husbandry.
Exists resources you've not discovered yet, returned [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to your city
Upon entering a foreign major civilization's capital city, sacrifice self and gain the [ICON_VISTOPSECRET] Top Secret Visibility to it.
Can use a charge to complete a district in one go.
No choice of selecting extra ability
Can choose {1_Num: number #} more extra {1_Num : plural 1?Ability; other?Abilities;}
Hope to maintain a high population in the empire and like a civilization that is also densely populated.
Will maintain an army, but not inclined towards aggressive warfare. Likes civilization that to do the same.
So is Writ, an Ode to Wine
Willing to collect massive works and dislikes competing civilizations.
Fortune Bringer of the Mortal Realm
Try to spread the gospel and maintain a high livability in the city. Like civilizations that do the same.
Hope to spy on the movements of other civilizations and be loyal to manipulating espionage activities.
Enjoy accumulating huge wealth and like a civilization that does the same.
Enthusiastic in helping the weak and gaining diplomatic support. Hate aggressors.
Your Shadwo Guard, {1_Name}'s investigation has revealed that
